activities:
For information received from those individuals who voluntarily sign up to receive marketing and promotional materials, we periodically distribute such materials (for example, an online newsletter).
For information received from those who are interested in adding our service to their website(s), we use submitted information to communicate with such individuals regarding the deployment and operation of our service in conjunction with their website(s).
For information received from those who voluntarily sign up for beta tests, we utilize such information in connection with determining eligibility and allowing such individuals to access and/or participate in the beta test.
For information received from those who voluntarily signup for our Facebook application, we utilize such information in connection with providing the functionality of our application.
contacttitle1: General Counsel / EVP, Legal & Business Affairs
corpofftitle1: General Counsel / EVP, Legal & Business Affairs
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Bulgaria, Cyprus, Czech Republic, Denmark, Estonia, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Iceland, Ireland, Italy, Latvia, Liechtenstein, Lithuania, Luxembourg, Malta, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: Customer (marketing/promotional materials, beta testing, Facebook). Client (those who wish to add our service to their site); this information is emailed to a representative of Gaikai for follow-up.
recoursemech: In Section XV of our privacy policy, users are encouraged to contact the ESRB (at the link provided in our privacy policy) if they believe we have not responded to, or satisfactorily addressed, their inquiry.
